profile.bio: Green party Parliamentary candidate for Vauxhall  :       Donations in excess of £50 will need to be checked to ensure that your donation is permissible - under UK electoral law for donations over £500 you will need to be on the electoral register or a company/charity/trade union/etc. registered in the UK.  Published and promoted by Gulnar Hasnain on behalf of Lambeth Green Party and Gulnar Hasnain
